I haven't looked at the code, but I'm sure it only loads the current map.

alternate_dph wrote:
> Does the coding for gladiator show that the game 1st starts up it
> automatically loads all maps or does it generate the maps as a player
> selects to go through the map?  I'm getting ready to modify my program
> to load real maps and I'm curious about how the real game handles it.
> 
>
